title: ChiBitCTy
author: ChiBitCTy
content: “ Fanatics Betting and Gaming has an industry edge combining one of the best global databases of diehard and casual sports fans, proven creative marketing and social strategies, cutting-edge technology, and Fanatics’ global brand recognition” https://www.fanaticsinc.com/fanatics-betting-gaming Curious if anyone had any thoughts abut this. I personally have never been a big fan of Fanatics (to those who aren’t aware of who they are, they are an online sports apparel website. They’ve expanded in to other sectors such as baseball cards, where they purchased Topps, a legendary baseball card company).   I won’t be using their services , but admittedly very curious how well they’ll do.
